attributes.additional_details:
BBC Three is a popular channel with the 16-34 audience age group throughout the country. It is one of few channels many of us Brits watch due to the fantastic range of programmes on this channel for the younger audience including -
Top Gear, Russell Howard's Good News; Bad Education, Family Guy; Dr Who; American Dad; Sun, Sex and Suspicious Parents and Snog, Marry or Avoid.
Tony Hall the director-general of the BBC is considering axing the BBC Three TV channel as part of a cost cutting move.
We must save BBC Three! If BBC Three is axed, I know for a fact the BBC will face a big backlash and potential loss of viewers from the younger audience.

rejection.details: For the BBC to decide upon.
